snippet: As part of his farewell tour, the Yankees’ Mariano Rivera met with a group of Cleveland Indians employees and a fan, answering questions.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Mariano Rivera meets with group of Cleveland Indians employees and a fan, answering questions as part of farewell tour.
lead_paragraph: As part of his farewell tour, the Yankees’ Mariano Rivera met with a group of Cleveland Indians employees and a fan, answering questions.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Rivera Meets With Indians Employees in Farewell Tour
headline.main: In Season of Goodbyes, Rivera Is Saying Thanks
headline.print_headline: In Season of Goodbyes, Rivera Is Saying Thanks
